page.title: 02Childrens Games
page.content:
Football Squash. No.of players 2to5.
1.You need: wall and big ball. 2.First player 2 kicks to hit wall. 3.When you hit wall next player tries. 4.If you miss you are out. 5.Continue game until one person left.
Scarecrow Tigs. No.of players 4to10.
1.Person 'on' tries to catch others. 2.When caught stand like a scarecrow. 3.Running under arm frees scarecrow. 4.If caught 3 times you are on.
The Snail Game. No.of players 4to10.
1.Draw spiral,mark squares,hop round. 2.If you tread on line,line up again. 3.Clear round - write name on square. 4.Next time you can rest on it but not others.Winner has most squares at end.
